alert.note: Alert for New York (Manhattan) (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued March 03 at 4:34PM EST until March 04 at 9:00AM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 9 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Up to one foot of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...New York (Manhattan) County. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 9 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding is expected in the more vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. Some roads and low lying properties including parking lots, parks, and homes and businesses with basements near the waterfront will experience minor flooding. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. NEW YORK HARBOR AT THE BATTERY NY MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 7.2 FT, MODERATE 8.5 FT, MAJOR 9.6 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 2.1 FT, MODERATE 3.4 FT, MAJOR 4.5 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 03/06 PM 5.2/ 5.7 0.1/ 0.6 1.3/ 1.8 0-1 NONE 04/05 AM 7.5/ 8.0 2.3/ 2.8 3.5/ 4.0 1-2 MINOR 04/06 PM 5.5/ 6.0 0.4/ 0.9 1.5/ 2.0 1 NONE 05/07 AM 5.9/ 6.4 0.8/ 1.3 1.3/ 1.8 1 NONE 05/07 PM 5.4/ 5.9 0.2/ 0.8 1.1/ 1.6 1 NONE 06/07 AM 4.7/ 5.2 -0.3/ 0.2 0.2/ 0.7 1 NONE &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
